thread.section_title: AmericanFlags.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of AmericanFlags.com | americanflags.com
thread.title: Connie Perkins

author: Connie Perkins
title: Connie Perkins
text: I've purchased several flags from American Flags and am pleased with the quality and the price. When most flag companies ceased making/selling the Confederate flag due to "political" pressure, it made me angry. I am a southern gal and proud of it. I had never flown the Confederate flag, but feel I have the right to do so--it is part of American history and many lost their lives for their cause. I decided I would fly one--but was shocked that there were none available and companies would no longer make them. Thank you, American Flags, for not buckling under pressure.
